infoMessages.title: ğˆğğ…ğğ‘ğŒğ€ğ“ğˆğğ!
infoMessages.description: is your multi-purpose Discord bot designed for fun, entertainment, and utility. With features, try your luck at gambling, play mini-games, and much more!
infoMessages.footer: Having any issues, need help, or want to report bugs? Clicking the link below

privacyMessages.title: Privacy Policy
privacyMessages.description: Your privacy is important to us. Please read our privacy policy below:

policies.name: 1. Data Collection
policies.value: We collect only the necessary data to provide and improve the bot's functionality. This may include user IDs, messages, and server information.

policies.name: 2. Data Usage
policies.value: The collected data is used exclusively for bot operations and is not shared with third parties.

policies.name: 3. Data Retention
policies.value: Data is retained only as long as necessary to fulfill the bot's purposes or as required by law.

policies.name: 4. User Rights
policies.value: You have the right to request data deletion or obtain a copy of your data at any time. Please contact the bot owner for such requests.

policies.name: 5. Changes to Policy
policies.value: We may update this privacy policy as needed. Continued use of the bot constitutes acceptance of any changes.

privacyMessages.footer: For more details, contact the bot owner.

registerMessages.alreadyRegistered: You are already registered. If you need assistance, please contact an admin.
registerMessages.registrationSuccessful: You have been successfully registered, {username}! You can now start using all features of the bot.
registerMessages.footer: If you need help or have questions, use the commands below.

rulesMessages.title: Bot Rules
rulesMessages.description: Please read and follow the rules below to ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience for everyone:

rules.name: 1. Respect Others
rules.value: Treat everyone with respect. Harassment, abuse, and hate speech are not tolerated.

rules.name: 2. No Spamming
rules.value: Avoid spamming commands or messages in chat. It disrupts the experience for others.

rules.name: 3. Follow the Server Rules
rules.value: In addition to these bot-specific rules, ensure you also follow the rules of the server you're in.

rules.name: 4. Appropriate Content
rules.value: Ensure that all content shared or generated using the bot is appropriate and adheres to the server's guidelines.

rules.name: 5. Report Issues
rules.value: If you encounter any issues or bugs with the bot, report them to the bot owner or moderators.

languageMessages.title: LANGUAGE SETTINGS
languageMessages.languageSetDescription: Your language has been set to **%{language}**.
languageMessages.exampleCommands:
â€¢ language
â€¢ language en
â€¢ language kh
â€¢ language cn
â€¢ language tw
â€¢ language jp
â€¢ language kr
â€¢ language fr
â€¢ language vn
â€¢ language lo
languageMessages.usageCommands:
â€¢ language - Shows your current language
â€¢ language en - Sets your language to English
â€¢ language kh - Sets your language to Khmer
â€¢ language cn - Sets your language to Chinese (CN)
â€¢ language tw - Sets your language to Chinese (TW)
â€¢ language jp - Sets your language to Japanese
â€¢ language kr - Sets your language to Korean
â€¢ language fr - Sets your language to French
â€¢ language vn - Sets your language to Vietnamese
â€¢ language lo - Sets your language to Lao
